N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 456.4 - Outreach for information and referral services

State Regulations

Each local social services department shall make outreach
efforts in its community by means of any or all of the following: (a) public speaking engagements; (b) stationing of services staff in various
community facilities such as schools, hospitals, senior citizen centers, neighborhood centers, and other public and private community
agencies; (c) providing applicants
for financial assistance, and recipients of financial assistance at each
periodic redetermination of eligibility, with an opportunity to request
services and forms prescribed by the State Department of Social

Services; (d) establishing of
satellite centers to increase the community's access to services; (e) in accordance with a plan submitted to
and approved by the department, stationing of services staff at Federal social
security district offices to provide information and referral services to
applicants for supplemental security income and social security
benefits. Notes
